modifier.worldmodifiers.armor_addition_c: Adds the additional armor value to all friendly mobs. Negative value means reducing the armor value. The modified armor value will not exceed vanilla's restriction (30).
NOTE: This modifier applies before the armor modification modifiers.
modifier.worldmodifiers.armor_addition_g: Adds the additional armor value to all non-player mobs. Negative value means reducing the armor value. The modified armor value will not exceed vanilla's restriction (30).
NOTE: This modifier applies before the armor modification modifiers.
modifier.worldmodifiers.armor_addition_m: Adds the additional armor value to all hostile mobs. Negative value means reducing the armor value. The modified armor value will not exceed vanilla's restriction (30).
NOTE: This modifier applies before the armor modification modifiers.
Modifies the base armor value of all friendly mobs. The modified armor value will not exceed vanilla's restriction (30).
modifier.worldmodifiers.armor_generic.de: Modifies the base armor value of all non-player mobs. The modified armor value will not exceed vanilla's restriction (30).
modifier.worldmodifiers.armor_monsters.d: Modifies the base armor value of all hostile mobs. The modified armor value will not exceed vanilla's restriction (30).
modifier.worldmodifiers.armor_toughness_: Adds the additional armor toughness value to all friendly mobs. Negative value means reducing the armor toughness value. The modified armor toughness value will not exceed vanilla's restriction (20).
NOTE: This modifier applies after the armor toughness modification modifiers.

Adds the additional armor toughness value to all non-player mobs. Negative value means reducing the armor toughness value. The modified armor toughness value will not exceed vanilla's restriction (20).
NOTE: This modifier applies after the armor toughness modification modifiers.
Adds the additional armor toughness value to all hostile mobs. Negative value means reducing the armor toughness value. The modified armor toughness value will not exceed vanilla's restriction (20).
NOTE: This modifier applies after the armor toughness modification modifiers.
Modifies the base armor toughness value of all friendly mobs. The modified armor toughness value will not exceed vanilla's restriction (20).
Modifies the base armor toughness value of all non-player mobs. The modified armor toughness value will not exceed vanilla's restriction (20).
Modifies the base armor toughness value of all hostile mobs. The modified armor toughness value will not exceed vanilla's restriction (20).
modifier.worldmodifiers.max_health_creat: Modifies the base maximum health of all friendly mobs. The modified maximum health will not exceed vanilla's restriction (1024).
modifier.worldmodifiers.max_health_gener: Modifies the base maximum health of all non-player mobs. The modified maximum health will not exceed vanilla's restriction (1024).
modifier.worldmodifiers.max_health_monst: Modifies the base maximum health of all hostile mobs. The modified maximum health will not exceed vanilla's restriction (1024).
modifier.worldmodifiers.max_health_playe: Modifies the base maximum health of all players. The modified maximum health will not exceed vanilla's restriction (1024).
modifier.worldmodifiers.movement_speed_c: Modifies the base movement speed of all friendly mobs, but does not affect the flying speed.

WARNING: Due to vanilla logic of calculating non-player mobs' movement speed, when the modifier's value is very low, non-player mobs may move slower than expected, and when the modifier's value is very high, non-player mobs may behave abnormally while moving.
modifier.worldmodifiers.movement_speed_g: Modifies the base movement speed of all non-player mobs, but does not affect the flying speed.

WARNING: Due to vanilla logic of calculating non-player mobs' movement speed, when the modifier's value is very low, non-player mobs may move slower than expected, and when the modifier's value is very high, non-player mobs may behave abnormally while moving.
modifier.worldmodifiers.movement_speed_m: Modifies the base movement speed of all hostile mobs, but does not affect the flying speed.

WARNING: Due to vanilla logic of calculating non-player mobs' movement speed, when the modifier's value is very low, non-player mobs may move slower than expected, and when the modifier's value is very high, non-player mobs may behave abnormally while moving.
modifier.worldmodifiers.movement_speed_p: Modifies the base movement speed of all players, but does not affect the flying speed.
worldmodifiers.editModifier.discardChang: %d modifiers' values have been changed. Are you sure you want to discard these changes?
worldmodifiers.editModifier.title: Edit Modifiers
worldmodifiers.selectWorld.extremeDiffic: Hostile mobs spawn and deal even more damage. The depletion of the hunger bar brings deadlier effects.
